body:
I figure this could be something that's implemented with cell meta-data. 

To clarify, this would be cells that are readable and executable

The discussion in #2125 is somewhat related to this.

IIRC there is a [celltoolbar preset (need icon updating)](https://github.com/ipython/ipython/blob/master/IPython/frontend/html/notebook/static/notebook/js/celltoolbarpresets/example.js#L35) that allow to lock cell. But it need to be loaded to have effect. 
Nothing prevent from loading a extension that keep the cell locked, without the toolbar beeing shown.

I'm not sure the full functionality should be in the core though.
